Class Metro

    • pT.PublicTransportation
      • CTM.CityBus
        • CTM.Metro

  • public class Metro
extends CityBus
    This is the Metro class created for Assignment 2. Constructors, Getters, Setters and methods using the class' attributes are included.
    Version:
    5.0 COMP 249 Assignment #2 February 24 2019
    Author:
    Morin-Laberge, William (ID #40097269), and Bouzidi, Camil (ID #40099611)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Metro

        public Metro()
        Constructor Default constructor

      • Metro

        public Metro(double ticketP,
             int nStops,
             long routeNum,
             int beginOpYear,
             java.lang.String lineName,
             int numVehicles,
             java.lang.String cityName)
        Constructor Parametrised constructor
        Parameters:
        ticketP: - the price of a ticket.
        nStops: - The number of stops the Metro has.
        routeNum: - route number of the Metro
        beginOpYear: - The year since the Metro has started operating
        lineName: - The name of the line the Metro is on
        numVehicles: - How many vehicles are attached to it
        cityName: - What city it belongs to

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object x)
        Equals method to verify if two Metro objects have the same attributes
        Overrides:
        equals in class CityBus
        Parameters:
        Object - : it is compared to the Metro object that calls the method
        Returns:
        boolean : true if the objects are identical, false if they are not. Before doing any checking, it verifies if the argument object is of the same class, and is not null.
